checkingForAutomatedFeedback.checking:
**Functional Purpose**: Title indicating the system is checking for feedback
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Checking For Automated Feedback state (main title)
**When Users See This**: When the modal is open and the system is actively looking for automated feedback
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Checking for automated feedback… "
checkingForAutomatedFeedback.inspectingC:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation of what the system is doing
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Checking For Automated Feedback state (descriptive paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal is open and the system is actively looking for automated feedback
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Our systems are inspecting your code to find both automated feedback and feedback given by mentors on similar solutions."
checkingForAutomatedFeedback.processTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational text about the expected duration of the check
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Checking For Automated Feedback state (time estimate paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the modal is open and the system is actively looking for automated feedback
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "This process normally takes ~10 seconds."
checkingForAutomatedFeedback.continueWai:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to allow users to proceed without waiting for the feedback check to complete
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Checking For Automated Feedback state (footer button)
**When Users See This**: When the system is checking for automated feedback and the user wants to continue without waiting
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Continue without waiting"
checkingForAutomatedFeedback.takingLonge:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed when the feedback check is taking longer than expected
**UI Location**: Realtime Feedback Modal → Checking For Automated Feedback state (caution text block)
**When Users See This**: If the feedback check exceeds its usual duration
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Sorry, this is taking a little longer than expected. You may wish to continue without waiting. You can view any feedback on the iterations tab of the solution later."
